<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a location of the specified class and dimensions at the specified position. Classes are defined in <tt>CfgLocationTypes</tt>. For possible location types see [[Location#Location Types|Location Types]]. For the actual name text of the location, use [[text]] and [[setText]] </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''createLocation''' [className, position, sizeX, sizeY]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [className, position, sizeX, sizeY]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> className: [[String]] - see [[Location#Location Types|Location Types]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> sizeX: [[Number]] in meters </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> sizeY: [[Number]] in meters </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Location]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_location = [[createLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[Location#Location Types|"NameVillage"]] , [4035,2151,10], 100, 100];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_location = [[createLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[Location#Location Types|"NameVillage"]] , [4035,2151,10], 30, 30];
_location [[setText]] "Player town";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
